title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Product name: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid.

This is a playset for children age 6 and up. It is an official Bakugan product from Spin Master.

What is included:
- 1 Deluxe Arena (customizable)
- 1 Special Attack Bakugan: Dragonoid (spinning type)
- 2 Clan Flags
- 3 Sparring Totem
- 1 Character Card
- 1 Special Attack Card
- 2 Gate Card
- 1 XL Rip Cord
- 1 Bakugan Token

Main features:
- Arena is customizable and has built-in phone holder.
- Special Attack Dragonoid can spin using the XL rip cord.
- Roll and display base, and Bakugan transforms when rolled onto Gate Cards.
- Multi-part ball linking system to connect and customize parts.
- Compatible with Training Sets for upgrade (sold separately).
- Special code included for online game; works with Roblox.
- Good for boys and girls who like action figures and collectibles.
- Collect more Special Attack variants and Battle Packs to expand.

Notes from manufacturer:
- Covered by Spin Master Care Commitment.

This set is good as a starter pack or to add to your Bakugan collection. Children can set up the arena, place sparring totems and clan flags, spin the Dragonoid with the rip cord, and use the cards for battles. The phone holder helps to watch rules or record play. It is simple to assemble, and parts are designed for repeated play. If you like to collect and customize, the ball linking system and upgrade options give many ways to change your Bakugan. Code for online play is inside the box.
